column4: i haven't heard of them, but i'm just getting into C++ myself
would recommend Bruce Eckel's C++ books. They're available online for free too
but we're getting a bit off topic :)
I'm not the boss, I'm just pre-empting the warning from a mod :) These are the books - http://www.mindview.net/Books/TICPP/ThinkingInCPP2e.html
